description.value:
At the end of each of his turns, Rhodar can take [[/damage 20]]{20 damage} to end one effect on him that can be ended by a saving throw. This damage can't be reduced in any way.

Rhodar can take two turns each round. He can't take turns consecutively.
Rhodar has damage immunity 5. If he takes holy damage, he loses this immunity until the end of the round.
Each enemy within 10 squares of Rhodar takes a -2 penalty to saving throws.
Rhodar has speed 15 and an edge on power rolls while any creature within 20 squares of him is bleeding. Any bleeding creature within 10 squares of Rhodar can't hide.

effect.after: A target restrained this way is impaled by a spear. Rhodar has four spears, each of which can be used to impale a target. At the start of each of his turns, Rhodar can summon any of his spears back to himself, ending the restrained condition on an impaled target.

effect.before:
Each target makes an Intuition test.

!

[[/damage 16 corruption]]{16 corruption damage}; [[/apply frightened save]].

@

[[/damage 13 corruption]]{13 corruption damage}; [[/apply frightened turn]].

#

[[/damage 8 corruption]]{8 corruption damage}

While a target is frightened this way, Rhodar ignores banes and double banes on abilities used against them.

tier3.display: {{potency}} the target is bleeding until the end of the encounter

effect.after: Rhodar regains Stamina equal to half the damage dealt.
Rhodar shifts up to his speed before or after using this ability He regains Stamina equal to half the total corruption damage dealt.

effect.before:
Area: Creates Two 3 cubes within 5

Each area is saturated with vengeful spirits until the end of the round. Any enemy who enters the area for the first time in a round or starts their turn there takes [[/damage 5 corruption]]{5 corruption damage}. At the end of the round, the spirits violently disperse. Each enemy within 2 squares of an area and has P < 5 is [[/apply weakened save]].
A target who has I < 5 is [[/apply frightened]]. This effect ends if the target is 11 or more squares from Rhodar.

system.trigger: A creature within distance makes a strike against Rhodar.

tier1.display: {{potency}} the target is blood soaked (save ends)

effect.after: While a creature is blood soaked, Rhodar has a double edge on abilities used against them.

effects.name: Blood Soaked
effects.description: While you are blood soaked, Rhodar has a double edge on abilities used against you.

effect.before:
Each target makes a Presence test.

!

[[/damage 16 corruption]]{16 corruption damage}; the target is [[/apply bleeding encounter]]{bleeding} until the end of the encounter.

@

[[/damage 13 corruption]]{13 corruption damage}; [[/apply bleeding save]]

#

[[/damage 8 corruption]]{8 corruption damage}
effect.after: Rhodar teleports to an unoccupied space in the area. If he has lost the damage immunity from his Grave Ward trait, he regains it.
Rhodar teleports to an unoccupied space adjacent to one target after the ability resolve.

effect.before: During this turn, Rhodar can move through creatures and objects at his usual speed, but can’t end his turn inside a creature or ob ject. Additionally, he doesn’t take damage from being force moved.
Rhodar takes an additional main action on his turn. He can use this feature even if he is dazed.

Rhodar throws one of his spears into an unoccupied space within 10 squares, or chooses one of his spears that he has already thrown. Until that spear returns to him or he uses this feature again, the spear emanates magical darkness in a 5 aura. Rhodar can see through this darkness, and any enemy is suffocating while in the darkness.
Rhodar chooses two creatures or objects within 20 squares of him. The targets immediately teleport to swap places. Any enemy their next turn.

effects.name: Grave Ward
effects.description: Rhodar has damage immunity 5. If he takes holy damage, he loses this immunity until the end of the round.
